title: 0.12.0rc6.dev92 doesn't report OutOfSpaceError (0.11.8.dev16 does)

labels.name: fix-implemented
labels.description: A fix is available, but has not been merged or released, yet.

body:
The original issue of reporting out of space https://github.com/datalad/datalad/issues/2938 was fixed by https://github.com/datalad/datalad/pull/2958 a year ago.

```
(dev3) yoh@ip-172-31-37-151:~/allen-neuropixels-try1$ datalad --version
datalad 0.11.8.dev16
(dev3) yoh@ip-172-31-37-151:~/allen-neuropixels-try1$ datalad get probe_848037572_lfp.nwb
OutOfSpaceError: command 'annex get' needs 1.4 GB more
```

but with

```
(dev3) yoh@ip-172-31-37-151:~/allen-neuropixels-try1$ datalad --version
datalad 0.12.0rc6.dev92
(dev3) yoh@ip-172-31-37-151:~/allen-neuropixels-try1$ datalad get probe_848037572_lfp.nwb
[WARNING] Running get resulted in stderr output: git-annex: get: 1 failed
 
[ERROR  ] Unable to access these remotes: web; Try making some of these repositories available:;        00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001 -- web; ; (Note that these git remotes have annex-ignore set: origin) [get(/home/yoh/allen-neuropixels-try1/probe_848037572_lfp.nwb)] 
get(error): probe_848037572_lfp.nwb (file) [Unable to access these remotes: web; Try making some of these repositories available:;      00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001 -- web; ; (Note that these git remotes have annex-ignore set: origin)]
```

```
(dev3) yoh@ip-172-31-37-151:~/allen-neuropixels-try1$ git annex version
git-annex version: 7.20190819+git2-g908476a9b-1~ndall+1
```
